SELECT a.id, a.title, a.sell_point, a.price, a.image, b. NAME category_name, c.name root_category_name FROM tb_item a
LEFT JOIN tb_item_cat b ON a.cid = b.id LEFT JOIN tb_item_cat c ON c.id = b.parent_id WHERE a.`status` = 1

SELECT id, title, sell_point, price, image
FROM tb_item WHERE STATUS =1;

SELECT id, title, sell_point, price, image
FROM tb_item WHERE STATUS =1 AND sell_point LIKE '%Organic%'
SELECT a.id, a.title, a.sell_point, a.price, a.image, b. NAME category_name FROM tb_item a LEFT JOIN tb_item_cat b ON a.cid = b.id WHERE a.`status` = 1
SELECT a.id, a.title, a.sell_point, a.price, a.image, b. NAME category_name FROM tb_item a LEFT JOIN tb_item_cat b ON a.cid = b.id WHERE a.`status` = 1 AND a.id=#{itemid}
